rajawali.util

Class MeshExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.util.MeshExporter

  • public class MeshExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for exporting models in various types. The exporter is flexible and should permit support of essentially any file type. In the future the exporter will be updated to support scenes for AWD exporting and any other model types that may support it.

    Example AWD exporting 

            BaseObject3D cube = new Cube(1f);
        MeshExporter exporter = new MeshExporter(cube);
        exporter.export("cube", AwdExporter.class);
    Author:
    Ian Thomas (toxicbakery@gmail.com)

      • export

        public void export(java.lang.String fileName,
          java.lang.Class<? extends AExporter> aExporter)
            throws MeshExporter.ExporterException
        Export the model using the set exporter without compression. The filename is appended with the extension defined by the exporter if enabled.
        Parameters:

        aExporter -
        Throws:
